summary: This document is a notice of voluntary dismissal filed in the case of Marvin Gerber and Kalma Koenig against Jeffrey E. Epstein and other defendants. The plaintiffs voluntarily dismiss the action without prejudice, meaning they can refile in the future. The dismissal is without costs to any party.

persons.name: Marvin Gerber
persons.context: Marvin Gerber is one of the plaintiffs in the case against Jeffrey E. Epstein and others, representing himself and others similarly situated.

persons.name: Kalma Koenig
persons.context: Kalma Koenig is another plaintiff in the case against Jeffrey E. Epstein and others, representing herself and others similarly situated.

persons.name: Hillary M. Nappi
persons.context: Hillary M. Nappi is the attorney representing the plaintiffs, Marvin Gerber and Kalma Koenig, in this case.

persons.name: Frank R. Schirripa
persons.context: Frank R. Schirripa is another attorney representing the plaintiffs in this case.

persons.name: Daniel B. Rehns
persons.context: Daniel B. Rehns is also an attorney representing the plaintiffs in this case.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is one of the defendants in the case filed by Marvin Gerber and Kalma Koenig.

events.title: Voluntary Dismissal
events.description: Marvin Gerber and Kalma Koenig voluntarily dismissed their case against Jeffrey E. Epstein and others without prejudice.

keyFacts: Marvin Gerber and Kalma Koenig filed a notice of voluntary dismissal in their case against Jeffrey E. Epstein.
The dismissal is without prejudice, allowing the plaintiffs to refile in the future.
The dismissal is without costs to any party involved in the case.
